item.title: Driving Hokkaido's West Coast to Wakkanai
item.description: I came to realise I created this website for myself and there are collection of thoughts and souvenir I wish I can keep forever. In my own pace, I will write them down and publish here with the Life tag. For our 2019 trip to Japan, we decided to go north, pointing the top point on the map. Seeing how close we could get to Russia was another light motive. We mainly travel with our stomach.
